doc.name: ChannelState
doc.description: This actor updates the channel state based on the information from PHY and NAV (Network Allocation Vector). To speed up simulation, slot events in 802.11 are not generated here.
doc.author: Yang Zhao
doc.port: The input port for channel status message from the physical layer. This has undeclared type.
The input port for messages from ValidateMpdu process. Two types of messages: UseIfs and RtsTimeout
The input port for setNav message from FilterMpdu.
The output port that produces messages that indicate the channel status.
